greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangular array read by rows.  T(n,k) is the number of 2-colored labeled graphs on n nodes with exactly k edges; n>=0, 0<=k<=A002620(n+1).
comment: A 2-colored labeled graph is a simple labeled graph in which each vertex is painted black or white and no black vertex is adjacent to a white vertex.
results.author: _Geoffrey Critzer_, Sep 07 2013
